title: CGSS of Pakistan, Azerbaijan state news agency agree to collaborate in research field
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 11 (APP):Center for Global and Strategic Studies (CGSS) of Pakistan and Azerbaijan State News Agency (Azer Tac) on Tuesday agreed to work collaboratively in the domain of research.
The decision to this effect was taken during the visit of CGSS delegation to Azer Tac, Baku.
The CGSS delegation comprised Lt. Col. Â® Khalid Taimur Akram, Executive Director CGSS Dr. Mehmood Ul Hassan Khan, Member Board of Experts, CGSS and Dr. Zafar Nawaz Jaspal, Department of International Relations Quaid-e-Azam University.
The delegation met Aslan Aslanov, Chairman of the Board, Vice-President of Organization of Asia-Pacific News Agencies (OANA), Azer Tac and Suleyman D.Ibrahimov,Representative of Azer Tac.
During the meeting, it was agreed that both parties will also exchange important news reports which will also enhance future cooperation and relations between Azerbaijan and Pakistan.
